body.name: Magic Mixies Unia The Unicorn Pixling - Reveal 6.5" Doll from Potion Bottle
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 21 hrs 36 mins
features: Mix your potion and a Pixling doll will magically appear!
Add the magical ingredients and watch as your elixir becomes a deep blue color inside the bottle, then turn and press down on the Crystal Gem topper…
Say the magic words "MAGICUS MIXUS" and prepare to witness real magic! Before your eyes the blue potion will turn clear, magically revealing a Pixling inside the bottle!
Meet Unia, the beautiful Unicorn Pixling whose Potion Power is "Dreams Come True"!
Unia the Unicorn Pixling is poseable with 7 points of articulation. She has rooted long hair, a softgood skirt and detailed shoes.
The Pixlings' potion bottle includes a doll stand allowing the Pixling doll to be posed and displayed.
body.description: Your child will be spellbound as they enter the enchanted realm of the Magic Mixies Pixlings and create a magic potion that reveals the magical Pixling Unia! From a land where potions flow from waterfalls and fountains, this Pixling spreads magic moments and joy! Now girls can mix their own special potion to magically reveal this beautiful Pixling doll. To create their potion, combine water with the included magical ingredients in the Potion Bottle. The potion will swirl and mix to become a deep dark blue color within the bottle. Then they say the magic words, "Magicus Mixus", while turning and then pressing the Crystal Gem. Before their eyes the blue potion becomes clear, magically revealing Unia the Unicorn Pixling inside! This enchanting Pixling doll is easily removed from the bottle and is completely dry and ready for your child to play with! Unia has beautiful long hair and a mystical pearl horn gem on her forehead. Wearing a celestial skirt and shoes, she is bright, sparkly and full of positivity. Her Potion Power is "Dreams Come True"! There are 3 different Pixlings for girls to magically create and collect! Each 6.5" doll has 7 points of articulation for easy posing and is beautifully detailed with gorgeous long brushable hair, a mystical pearl gem on their forehead, softgood fashions with iridescent finishes and crafted shoes! Girls will love joining Unia the Unicorn Pixling in her enchanting land and adventuring into a world of real magic!

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So Much Plastic Waste, But Gorgeous Dolls
reviews.reviewText: After my daughters got others in the set for Christmas, I ended up purchasing Deerlee here so I could play with them (no shame! None at all! They're only this little once!) After seeing the gimmick of the magic mixing potion a few times already, I would have appreciated an option for someone who JUST wants the doll and is good on the experience of unboxing it.Don't get me wrong, the experience IS fun! It's a little messy but that's easy to combat, and the blue liquid dries clear. It's just time-consuming, and, yes, pretty wasteful, even though the QR code gives you ideas for how to repurpose the bottle. If you are trying to "collect them all", though, as our family is? That's a lot of bottles, and they end up, inevitably, in the recycling bin with the hopes that the center can take them.The dolls themselves aren't a SUPER great value for what you get, but they're lovely. The faces are pretty, detailed, and fun to look at, the clothes are charming, the scale is unusual but great for dollhouses. The hair is a high-quality nylon. I'm super glad that the Mixies franchise has expanded to high-fantasy humanoid dolls because these are lovely, and look as good on the shelf in my office as they do hopping around a playscape.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars very cute and fun
reviews.reviewText: These dolls are so cute!!! I'm an adult collector but the potion gimmick really intrigued me and the designs are absolutely darling! The instructions were very clear and easy to follow. The blue liquid potion dries clear, which is very convenient because on both the bottles I did I accidentally spilled a bit of the liquid trying to pour it into the bottle. It also leaked a little into the inner chamber with the dolls themselves but it only really got on one of them(on the skirt specifically) and it dried clear very quickly so you can't even tell. The outfit tops are moulded on the bodies but the skirts are fabric. I only have 1 little gripe with these: on Amber(the teal and pink dragon girl) her skirt is made of a fake fur that very easily sheds at the edges if you mess with it. Not a problem for me as they're going to be displayed but I can easily see a kid accidentally ripping tufts out during regular play. If you're gifting these to a child I'd say they'll probably need some supervision and possibly help depending on how old they are as this could get messy if you're a little clumsy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This was super cute and fun to do! My six year old got this for Christmas and she loves it! It is pretty cool to do the magic spell (you just dump the included pouches of ingredients into the bottle and say the magic words!). You get to watch as the dark blue potion turns clear and reveals your pixling! My daughter had so much fun with this and the little doll is adorable! My kiddo has a January birthday right around the corner, so I may end up getting her another one of these for her birthday! ❤️

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Easy for like ones to make and have fun creating. Nicely made, dolls are adorable and perfect size, well worth buying.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Kids loved it
reviews.reviewText: I was a little disappointed with the “potion,” I was expecting a little more than basically food coloring, water and glitter. Plus it didn’t mix half as pretty as commercials made it seem. But it was enough to make my little ones happy and have fun. Kind of expensive for basically a doll. But the doll has a lot of cute details, and has been used for lots of pretend play. So I would buy it again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a great new line from Moose. The dolls are adorable and have a cute overall theme. The gimmick is "magically creating" your doll by making a potion. There's a few steps but nothing was difficult to figure out and it would be child friendly (with some supervision so they don't spill water all over).I was impressed that the doll did not get wet from the potion making. The packaging is actually really good. I would love to see a larger version of these dolls without the potion making gimmick. Currently, they're 6 inches tall but the details on them are super impressive for the scale. Great paint, cute body blushing, articulation at the head, shoulders, elbows, and hips. Top is molded on and painted but the skirt is fabric and the shoes are removable. The hair is SO soft. It's genuinely shocking how soft it is.My favorite part of the package design was that one of the plastic tabs you remove to make the potion ends up doubling as a STAND! It's phenomenal and a major big brain moment. Thank you Moose for making reusable plastic bits. The bottle itself can be reused after washing - either to display your doll or to do the "other potion" activities that you can access using a QR code on the instructions. I wasn't super impressed with the "other potion" crafts but at least they're trying to encourage no just throwing away the giant plastic bottle.I think this might end up being one of my favorite new doll lines from 2023!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Unia is the most precious little addition to my nightstand. It took me several months, though, to decide to buy these dolls because of the plastic and chemical waste. I know the potions gimmick is the hook (and as a kid, I personally would have gone wild for it), but I wish we could somehow get these ladies without allof that and without purchasing second hand. Love these dolls though, and I’m so happy they exist. They give me 90s trolls vibes with their jewel and awesome hair!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Cool little doll and a memorable moment spent with my girls.
Muy divertido y fácil de usar, hermosa la muñeca que viene. Mi hija quedó fascinada
La poupée est de qualité. Elle couleurs sont vivantes. Elle sors comme par magie. Ma petite est en amour avec cette petite poupée

reviews.reviewTitle: Plastic waste , but fun for kids
reviews.reviewText: Lovely , very exciting and funJust a lot of plastic waste .
The instructions that come with this are very difficult to follow. It made a huge mess and we were never clear on what was supposed to happen. Would not recommend.
